queries.query: small spellcasting humanoid that uses illusions and communicates with tiny beasts
queries.variant: humanoid that is small and casts spells, helps with illusions and talks to small animals

queries.query: Gnome illusionist with crowd control spells and average physical strength
queries.variant: illusionist Gnome that controls crowds and has average strength in melee

queries.query: Forest Gnome capable of casting major illusion spells and capable of teleportation
queries.variant: Gnome from the forest that can cast big illusion spells and teleport

queries.query: intelligent and dexterous gnome who excels in magic and ranged attacks
queries.variant: gnome with high intelligence and dexterity that is great at magic and ranged combat

queries.query: versatile illusionist that can cast spells like fireball and greater invisibility
queries.variant: illusionist that can use fireball and become invisible with spells
